dublin_core.dcvalue: There is general concern regarding the possible hazardous health effects of exposure to radiofrequency electromagnetic radiation emitted from mobile phones This study aimed to assess the effects of chronic exposure to electromagnetic waves emitted from Global System for Mobile Communication GSM mobile phones on auditory functions
Journal of otolaryngology - head And neck surgery = Le Journal d'oto-rhino-laryngologie et de chirurgie cervico-faciale
Audiologic disturbances in long-term mobile phone users.
